description:
Tagiru, Taiki, and Yuu are invited to an event on a certain island where the strongest and most experienced Digimon Hunters can Hunt a powerful Digimon. When the event starts, they enter the forests in search of the powerful Digimon that lurks there, Volcdramon. Taiki and the others try to Hunt him, but the intense heat he unleashes makes it a difficult battle. Then, someone who didn`t enter the event joins in! Who could he be?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hunter Dai Shuugou! Minami no Shima no Digimon Soudatsusen!
The Great Gathering of Hunters! A Fierce Digimon Battle on a Southern Island!
ハンター大集合! 南の島のデジモン争奪戦!
